body_html:
@soumith , CUDA v9.2 is installed (the latest version). I have GeForce GT 650M. I also downloaded cuDNN v7.1.4 (latest version) and moved the library files to cuda folder by running the commands below.

sudo mv cudnn.h /usr/local/cuda/include/
sudo mv libcudnn* /usr/local/cuda/lib/

Then I downgraded xcode CLT to v8.2, set the cmake prefix path, cloned pytorch. Building also seemed to work just fine. What am I missing ?
body_text:

sudo mv cudnn.h  /usr/local/cuda/include/
sudo mv libcudnn*  /usr/local/cuda/lib/ 
Then I downgraded xcode CLT to v8.2, set the cmake prefix path, cloned pytorch. Building also seemed to work just fine. What am I missing ?
body:
@soumith , CUDA v9.2 is installed (the latest version). I have GeForce GT 650M.  I also downloaded cuDNN v7.1.4 (latest version) and moved the library files to cuda folder by running the commands below.

`sudo mv cudnn.h  /usr/local/cuda/include/`
`sudo mv libcudnn*  /usr/local/cuda/lib/ `

Then I downgraded xcode CLT to v8.2, set the cmake prefix path, cloned pytorch. Building also seemed to work just fine. What am I missing ?
